questions.question: What role did the pigs play during the harvest?

choices.answer: They harvested the grain.
They washed out the kennels.
They supervised the workers.
They cooked all of the meals.

questions.question: What was the result of the first harvest since the animals took over the farm?

choices.answer: It was the best harvest that the farm had ever seen.
They lost everything in a drought.
None of the animals knew how to use the human's tools.
Most of the food ruined before they could get it stored.
Boxer is a beast!
Animalism is the best!
We will succeed!
I will work harder!

questions.question: Which words best describe the work ethic of Mollie and the cat?

choices.answer: Easily directed
Often missing
Always on task
Fearless leaders

questions.question: What was part of the animals' routine on Sundays?

choices.answer: A flag was raised
They had an early breakfast.
They stayed alone in their stalls.
They ate twice as much food.

questions.question: What did all of the animals try to learn?

choices.answer: How to walk on two legs
How to bathe
How to sing
How to read

questions.question: What had happened to the missing milk?

choices.answer: It had leaked out into the ground
It was mixed with the pigs' food
It was given to Boxer for all of his hard work
It was given to the pups

questions.question: What did Napoleon do while Snowball made committees?

choices.answer: Experimented with better ways to harvest crops.
Took away and educated the pups.
He worked on building up the orchard.
He hid in the forest to take long naps.

questions.question: What became the main slogan for the animals on the farm?

choices.answer: Animalism is the way to go!
Down with Mr. Jones!
Four legs good, two legs bad!
Farm living is the life for me!

questions.question: Which claim could best be supported based on chapter 3?

choices.answer: Animals are too stupid to run a farm by themselves.
Animalism is an improvement from Mr. Jones' reign.
The animals are too smart to let the pigs fool them.
The pigs are deserving of the extra apples and milk.
